sen.j: 冷泉 為紀（れいぜい ためもと、1854年 - 1905年）は日本の歌人。
sen.e: Tamemoto REIZEI (1854 - 1905) was a Japanese kajin (waka poet).
Tamemoto REIZEI (1854-1905) was a Japanese kajin (waka poet).
sen.cmt: ハイフン前後のスペース削除しました。
sen.e: Tamemoto REIZEI (1854-1905) was a Japanese kajin (waka poet).
Tamemoto was the 21st head of the Kami-Reizei family.
Tamemoto was the 21st head of the Kami-Reizei family.
Tamemoto was the 21st head of the Kami-Reizei family.
Tamemoto's father was Tametada REIZEI.

sen.j: 明治17年（1884年）7月7日、伯爵を授かる。
sen.e: On July 7, 1884, Tamemoto was given a title of Count.
On July 7, 1884, Tamemoto was given a title of count.
On July 7, 1884, Tamemoto was given a title of count.

sen.j: 明治31年（1898年）から死去まで伊勢神宮の大宮司をつとめた。
sen.e: Tamemoto served as Daiguji (the supreme priest) of Ise-jingu Shrine from 1898 to his death.
sen.cmt: 事実およびwikiサイト記載に準じ、原文に「大」を加筆修正のうえ訳出しました。参考： [1] http://www.isejingu.or.jp/english/sikinen/sikinen2.htm [2]（神宮観月会の項）http://isenet.jp/oisesan/html/news.html
sen.e: Tamemoto served as Daiguji (the supreme priest) of Ise-jingu Shrine from 1898 to his death.
Tamemoto served as Daiguji (the supreme priest) of Ise-jingu Shrine from 1898 to his death.
Tamemoto had a son named Tametsugi REIZEI.
